description:
Archer of Black is http://anidb.net/ch89994 [Fiore Forvedge Yggdmillennia]`s Servant. His wish is for the gods to return his immortality. He was the teacher of the http://anidb.net/ch88731 [Rider of Red] in previous life.
[spoiler="True Name and Noble Phantasm"]His true name is Chiron, a centaur, who was known as a great sage among his kind in Greek mythology. He is the son of the titan Cronus, patron of the harvest and the earth, and the deity Philyra, making him a divine spirit that would not normally qualify for the status of heroic spirit. He received various teachings from the gods. Therefore, young and immature heroes gathered around him as a mentor. However, due to some unfortunate events, he lost his complete divinity along with immortality, allowing him to become an existence that could be summoned by the Grail.
His Noble Phantasm is Antares Snipe, which allows him to shoot a magical arrow that will automatically track its target.[/spoiler]
Source: TYPE-MOON Wiki
name: Kuro no Archer
